panels.visual: Visual: Inside the maze - walls of shimmering crystal that reflect Lightsword's image a thousand times. Some reflections look normal, others... wrong. Colored lights pulse through the crystal. Location: Maze of Echoes entrance Characters: Lightsword, Darkstorm
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "The Maze of Echoes. Illusions, traps, and somewhere deeper... crying."

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.
